website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for printer paper by a top-selling brand that is practical for numerous printing needs, this versatile HP paper is a sound choice.
pros: Multi-use paper by a HP, one of the most recognizable brands in printers
Has ColorLok technology that keeps ink in place
In addition to inkjet and laser printers, can be used in copiers and fax machines
cons: Some types of ink will bleed through the paper
Packages with bent/wrinkled sheets have been reported

customer_reviews.title: I like this paper...a lot.
customer_reviews.text: When I worked at Kinko's this was called "the good stuff". It is. It is a clean bright white registers as a 161. It seems a little more than 20 pound paper by touch, as if that it were a detriment. This is running through my new Canon ink jet--clean lines, no color bleed. Big hosannas, this is--assuming you are not looking to lay down a lot saturated ink--great for double sided printing. The results on quick print are good, also. It's a good value with a great result.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy my paper came opened like this ..
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alyssa Adams

customer_reviews.title: This paper is good for black & white text only in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: This paper is very thin and will fold and warp if you print something too inky. This paper is good for black & white text only in my opinion. If you print any color or photos, I don't recommend this specific type of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Defective Batch?
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this particular brand and quality of HP print paper before but this package must have been defective. It is labeled as being 20# paper but as soon as I opened the package, I noticed that the paper was unusually thin. In fact it was so thin, the entire ream was 'wavy'. Consequently, EVERY sheet I tried to print with it got jammed in my printer. I know it isn't the printer because I had a few sheets left from the previous pack and they printed just fine. Fortunately, Amazon was kind enough to do a refund. I ordered a ream of 24# paper, same HP brand and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: This might be a little more expensive (depending on when you buy it) than a ream that's on sale at Staple's or Walmart, but it also seems to be of higher quality than the average 20lb paper. For as little as I use copy paper at home, I'm happy with this purchase. It also holds up pretty well with most fountain pen / ink combinations I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the palindrome.

customer_reviews.title: Great For the Price
customer_reviews.text: This paper is great for the price. You get 500 sheets and it works perfectly fine with my Samsung Laser Jet Printer. It is a little thin though, so if you are printing on both sides, you can see the other side if the paper is held up to a brightly lit place. However, if the paper is on a table or has a darker background behind it, this really isn't a big deal. I would use this paper mostly for things I want to print for myself or items that don't need to be double-sided. If I was going to print something to give to someone else, I'd probably just print one side per page.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Song

customer_reviews.title: Good, multi purpose printer paper
customer_reviews.text: A nice average weight, multi purpose purpose printer paper. It is a bright white paper, so works well for quality printing as well as general use. Glad I found it here, long drive to stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D.

customer_reviews.title: OK printer paper but be aware that it may be damaged in shipping process.
customer_reviews.text: When I receive the paper it was all folded up and was on able to be used for printing. OK printer paper but be aware that it may be damaged in shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: TPA

customer_reviews.title: All four packages arrived ripped open.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps has to do with the packaging material, it all four arrived opened and paper jammed in two blocks, cause the shipping box was too large or the actual packaging is poor...
customer_reviews.author: Marina Poplavskaya Guedouar

customer_reviews.title: Paper is great, a little wrinkly.
customer_reviews.text: Im using tis for my copier/ scanner. I wanted to use a product that is acid free. The paper seems to accept my felt tip color pens/gels well. Other paper Ive used would buckle with only one swipe of the pen. Id been happier if my order had been packed better. I opened a box with paper askew and two DEFLATED air bags. I was able to unbend and Im able to use most of the paper. Probably better to use bubble wrap Thanks, Shell
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: not good for laser printers
customer_reviews.text: Seems thinner than 20 pound should be. Bright enough but corners curl after going through laser printer making it difficult to print both sides of a sheet. HP paper used to be good but has obviously gone downhill. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable,  the item arrived open
customer_reviews.text: This item was in a box with 3 other purchases. As you can see by the picture, the item arrived open. Am I supposed to count the sheets of paper to make sure there are 500? Unacceptable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for household/school/general purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my (now defunct) Epson Artisan 810 inkjet, my new HP OfficeJet Pro 8720 inkjet, and my ancient Brother HL-1440 Monochrome laser printer. We use about a ream every 6 weeks, so we aren't heavy users. I've tried the 22lb, but it is a bit too much for general use. As long as the price is competitive, I will continue to purchase. Update: Still no issues, just ordered another 2 reams.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Sirius

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: The paper is thin and curls when I print something
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, clean and bright
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with the quality and feel of this paper. I don’t print a lot of important things, but when I do I’m glad this paper is already in printer and don’t have to swap it out. The price is good enough to be an everyday printer paper and for higher quality printing needs.
customer_reviews.author: hollybd

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but came ripped open soooo idk
customer_reviews.text: When unboxed then paper, it was torn open. I like my products to come closed and look nice. This just looks like someone took it from their shelf at home and dumped it into a box and shipped it. Like come on! Other than that.... still waiting to print because my printer has been delayed smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paper is a bit thin for my liking. Only good for one side prints
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this paper to save a few bucks from my regular HP paper and now I realized why it is cheaper. The paper is decent if you only need one side. The paper is too thin for printing on both sides. It is one of those paper you can literally see through under the light.
customer_reviews.author: Yong Ning Lu

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It's paper people! its made from trees! it's not naturally white in color, man does that, it's used in a printer, you put letters and numbers on it! Pros: very good print quality Cons: A bit pricey, same quality paper at the local office Max is $6.99
customer_reviews.author: REPENTyouSINNERS

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: For years I would buy store-brand paper and always be dissatisfied. Or buy higher end like Hammermill and feel that it was overpriced. Finally, I read a review of printer paper in Tom's Hardware Guide (yes, they actually reviewed paper) that gave this paper top marks, and at last printing nirvana was reached. This is truly a superior everyday paper that works great in both laser and inkjet printers (I own both). What else can I say? Buy this paper and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: zolo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: For everyday paperwork activities for my 3-4 yr old students this is great for printing, not too thick and not too thin just right. The brightness is also good but I think $10 for a ream is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Marylou B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: because amazon sees fit not to contact me on any problem I may have.
customer_reviews.author: pen

customer_reviews.title: Great paper at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: And it saves me a trip to the store. It's too dangerous to go to the store with this Covid-19 going on. By the way, I think the paper is even cheaper online then going to the store anyways. I got my paper. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality general-purpose printing paper, very bright, nice surface
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all-around printing paper for documents, etc. Despite the idea of the paperless office, I work at home (I'm a writer) and I'm printing things all day. Normally I buy paper by price (most of it ends up in the shredder eventually, let's face it) but I'll seek out this HP paper next time, it's very high quality. Arrived without banged corners too--which is not always the case when buying paper online.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Home Schooling and WFH
customer_reviews.text: Since all this COVID-19 we are forced to WFH and do Homeschooling. We purchased these papers and they feel great. They doesn't feel like cheap paper at all and work great with my laser printer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose paper but not for writing
customer_reviews.text: Not real thrilled with this paper because it seems to have some kind of coating on it that makes writing on it difficult (especially with pencil).
customer_reviews.author: Marvel

customer_reviews.title: It’s paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper is very pappery. One sheet after another of paper. Must be like several hundred sheets. And they’re all blank. Like I’m supposed to fill them out myself. Both side are blank too.
customer_reviews.author: Indy runner

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyday and Presentations
customer_reviews.text: We bought two packs of this HP 96 brightness for printing my daughter's science fair data. We have an HP8610 serise and she needed to print about six hundred pages including multiple color charts. The paper didn't stick, the white is bright and her presentation report looked fantastic. This is my Go to papernow!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Typical Multipurpose Paper, Good Value in a Pinch
customer_reviews.text: With brick and mortar stores shutting and the risks associating with going out, it was great to have a ream of paper available on prime. A good value in a pinch but not for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not Breast Cancer Pink
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting paper that supported Breast Cancer research. That is what the photo shows. That is not what I received. If I had known that I was not getting this specific paper, I may have bought something else. I have not tried this multipurpose paper yet. Please post an accurate photo for other buyers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: C. ROWE

customer_reviews.title: Very good every day paper.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought HP Multipurpose Ultra White paper before, so it's exactly what I expected. 20lb. paper is middle weight and I find it is just right for every day printing, neither too flimsy nor heavier than I need. I didn't give it five stars because I don't "love it", but for every day printing I don't want or need paper that I love. The fact that I'm a repeat buyer shows that I'm happy with it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Tait

customer_reviews.title: excellent product and super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: hello, out of paper and need some the next day? you could go to one of the big chain stores or just use the amazon services. the cost is much better here and the delivery was so fast, that we were surprised to see the package on our porch. the product is the standard hp paper, but the b/w printing from our epson artisan printer stands out when finished. 96 is perfect for everyday printing, for printing special notices and in times of actual letter writing on the computer... colors stand out and the b/w printing is high quality. this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jnaki

customer_reviews.title: Plastic ream wrapper badly torn upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: The package looked ok when it was delivered. I opened it and the wrapper that keeps the paper in the ream in place was all torn up so the paper is all messed up. Not pleased. Since the delivery package was fine, my thought is that it was shipped with the torn plastic wrapper. Not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time or money
customer_reviews.text: I was scammed. It's advertised as Ultra White 96 bright paper. However, that's definitely a lie! I tested this against plain 84 bright simple paper. I printed several small photos along with some text. The shocking result was that the plain paper looked way better than this HP paper. Several members of my family said the same so I know for sure that this paper is garbage. Save your money and get the least expensive paper as long as it's not HP. The cheap plain paper will definitely look a lot better than this. I learned my lesson. Never ever will I buy this paper.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd write a review about paper, but this one's a winner! Never jams, is an excellent weight for both laser and inkjet printers, and gives a brightness and clarity to your work. So much better than those no-name papers that stick, jam, and crumple. For a little more money, you can get something really effective for your presentations and schoolwork (even for your Amazon receipts)! Will continue using HP multipurpose paper, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Happyslapper

customer_reviews.title: Good all purpose paper
customer_reviews.text: This is a good all purpose paper with a nice feel to it. I was looking for a glossy paper to print dvd cover illustrations on, and this paper does pretty well. I think I need something with a higher gloss for that job, but this paper will suffice. For general use I will be very pleased with it, both for the texture and the weight. It feel substantial and it takes ink well from both my printers, a photosmart and an ink jet.
customer_reviews.author: IrisRose

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Soft paper, looks brand new, no pinholes. Affordable price and great print quality. Highly recommended for HP printers!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It came from Costco
customer_reviews.text: That makes this my first Costco purchase. I have a one person household so a mountain of toilet paper isn't that attractive. I'll say though, it was a bit of a shock to see Costco using Amazon. They seem to have an active site of their own. As to the paper, it is a nice bright white that I don't have to be embarrassed using. It is the right weight to go through my laser. So, 3 to 5 stars are certainly in order. I went with the middle but could have gone higher, if "Loving" paper had a bit better connotation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, bright, white paper
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, bright white paper. I use it for relator printouts to hand to clients while showing homes. I will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Snoozer31

customer_reviews.title: fast service and good paper
customer_reviews.text: I needed paper for my printer but had no time to go out and buy it. This was fast and easy and convenient. Yes I would order this again
customer_reviews.author: Noreen M. Knutsen

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s paper that I print stuff on, I don’t even know what bad paper is. I have never gotten a sheet of paper from anywhere in my life and been like “This paper sucks!”
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Thomas Layton Ratley

customer_reviews.title: "GREAT PRICE, GOOD QUALITY, AND NO PAPER JAMS!"
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this pack for the first time, and as usual, HP has come through once again. The price is one of the best as I've compared to purchasing in different office supply stores. The quality is top notch. I have no complaints. Thus far, I've already used about 50 pages & it was recently delivered. The colors are bright & no paper jams noted on my 2 printers. When I find a product this good, I will order again-and-again. Totally satisfied. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Author/Reviewer Geri AhearnTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Bright sturdy thick letters bold on paper
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper my letters looks bold and bright I will definitely buy more wasn’t sure about this paper at first I thought the paper would be light and flimsy but I was wrong glad I chose this paper made a right choice
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: It's Bright White
customer_reviews.text: I like copy paper that is very white. My copies come out clean and crisp. And it's terrific for copying in color. I like recipes and I'm able to capture all the detail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Printing paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper looks bigger than the standard printing paper I might return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright paper, but not THICK
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some thick paper, so decided to give these a try. These are good, better than other paper I'hv ever used. But, if you are looking for thick paper, you should buy those, which are more than 20 lb. This paper is bright & the quality is good for 20 lb. If you ok with thin paper, go for it. But, these are not for me, I'm gonna try these:
customer_reviews.author: insomniac

customer_reviews.title: This printing paper is good quality and works well at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought cheaper printing paper before that was too thin and would jam my printer or double feed into the printer. This printing paper is good quality and works well at a decent price. It has always served my needs and is reliable without being too fancy/pricey. This HP Multipurpose paper had become my preferred printing paper over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Fellow Amazon Member

customer_reviews.title: Great paper, true white and flawless feed and performance
customer_reviews.text: As I used to work on copiers many years ago I am very picky about the paper I use as I know it has an impact on performance and quality. This is top flight paper and I recommend you purchase this for your HP device
customer_reviews.author: Steven Earle

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like that I could have this sent to my house without having to drive into town for this one item. Paper works well with my HP printer
customer_reviews.author: MsWestie

customer_reviews.title: great copies.
customer_reviews.text: It went right in like the much more expensive cartridges and is making wonderful copies. I'm saving money with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time buying.
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality paper. Firm and takes ink very well.
customer_reviews.author: georjec

customer_reviews.title: Good Paper
customer_reviews.text: This is good paper for regular household printing. As a teacher, I do much of my printing at home.
customer_reviews.author: sd83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 8-1/2 X 11 inch was great but the 8 1/2 X 14 inch was loose in the box. The packaging had broken open and the paper was loose. Some damaged but enough was useable so I am using what I can - no big deal, just giving input for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: StevenJay

customer_reviews.title: Decent copy paper
customer_reviews.text: My paper arrived on time and not damaged. Seems to print well and hold the ink without smearing.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Onna

customer_reviews.title: Go great
customer_reviews.text: It was worth it I only use hp copy paper I couldn’t leave the house to to the covid -19
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT UNSEALED.
customer_reviews.text: I received the ream of paper with paper package OPEN. It was not sealed. Not the packaging box but the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Addict

customer_reviews.title: buying paper from Amazon is like a role of the dice
customer_reviews.text: am I going to get 1 ream? 5 reams? 10 reams? It's really not clear from the listing. I emailed customer service to clarify and they couldn't tell me. (The customer service rep in India can't exactly pop over to the back of the warehouse in Ohio to check.) So I decided to try it for myself. I got 5 reams (2500 sheets of paper), which puts this at a decent, but not spectacular, price. I'm satisfied. (I can't guarantee that you will get 5 reams when you order the same product). As far as the quality of the paper, what can I say, it's paper. It's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great for all printing jobs.
customer_reviews.text: I use this paper in my HP printer. It makes everything look sharp and professional. I also found that it doesn’t jam as much as other brands do.
customer_reviews.author: MistyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Choice of printer paper
customer_reviews.text: This has been my choice of printer paper for years and will continue to be for the foreseeable future. This time the box was bent and the wrapper was pretty torn up but the contents were not affected...no tears, smudges or bent corners, etc. I chalk that up to rough shipping, not product failure.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonMac

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I always trust in Amazon to buy my supplies. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a big deal. It's paper. I can say that it's a nice quality. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: This is the Major Deal of the Day!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliance, quality. What can I say, Hewlett Packard is a quality product and when you can find this kind of quality at that kind of price... you'd better snatch it up, because bargains like this don't stand on every corner. Grab it while you can. This is a major deal, my friend. Don't believe me.... waste time, check around.... go ahead. You'll be back for this deal. Unless you don't really care about top rate quality at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paper
customer_reviews.text: This paper is perfect for my HP OfficeJet Pro 8720. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J.S. Ananda

customer_reviews.title: Good, thick quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my printer. Everything is better than I expected, very good value for the money. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellant paper for HP printers especially HP psc 1610xi All in one
customer_reviews.text: These printers are known to be difficut with the use of smooth operation. especially paper jams and etc. If this paper is installed into this printer properly with the bottom edge level with the chrome push bar on the extension with it pushed in; This paper prints and executes perfectly. patiently snug the paper into the printer as you scan a first page to the chrome push bar of the extension. BOOM!
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition, although packed in a box that seemed too long for the one ream. But it was padded well with crinkle paper. Prints great quality on my Brother laserjet!
customer_reviews.author: Bajraktarević

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: Half the paper was unusable due to a damaged (bent over / folded) corner. Disappointed. VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had bought discount paper at discount store and it was to thin didn't like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great paper works well with my Cannon MG5420 printer. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: convenient delivery
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is heavy and I use a lot of it. Nice to have delivered to the door but CVS actually better price.
customer_reviews.author: erwink617

customer_reviews.title: thank you for fast efficient service
customer_reviews.text: WOW! That was really fast! I had barely finished typing my order and my product arrived. Thank you for such fast service and a great product at a really good price. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Harris

customer_reviews.title: HP impresses me again
customer_reviews.text: I say that HP impresses me again, because I ordered this pack of paper, mainly because it was the cheapest of the options at the time, and it is what I was looking for. The 5th star was given because it shipped and arrived way sooner than it said it would be here. I actually got it in the mail a full 2 days before I ever got an email saying it was shipped! That's the first time I've had that happen.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomSurveys

customer_reviews.title: High quality paper right at home
customer_reviews.text: Having a printer and with multipurpose printer paper it is better than going to the library for printing. Very convenient for my college student children.
customer_reviews.author: Always a nurturer.

customer_reviews.title: Paper is fine.
customer_reviews.text: My printer likes the paper enough not to jam. The words & pics are clear & crisp, & the ink dries quickly. All-in-all, the paper does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Greenwink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Omg this paper is amazing...wont buy any other kind now...im hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality paper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality paper. I thought it was the same as i buy in stores, but it has to be different. The weight is technically the same as i buy, but this paper just feels more substantial. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross I.

customer_reviews.title: If you need printer paper this is the place to come
customer_reviews.text: I was out of paper for my printer and I found this to be the best for me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: N.K.Beckley

customer_reviews.title: It’s paper.
customer_reviews.text: This is paper. Would recommend for anyone with paper needs. You can write on, print on it, and recycle it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ream online since I was ordering other office supplies(toner cartridges)and realized "How Convenient!" I received the order in just a couple of days and the packaging was perfect too! No more lugging reams of paper from the store to the car and once again from the car to the house! The paper is definitely Multipurpose! Great for printing photos too!
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Maine

customer_reviews.title: On point
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. Super fast shipping. Reasonable price -thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Marge Redbird

customer_reviews.title: HP Multipurpose printer paper (20 lb, 96 brightness). It is what they say it is
customer_reviews.text: I always use HP Multipurpose printer paper (8.5" x 11", 20 lb, 96 brightness). I like the 20 lb because it's thinner and cheaper than the 22 lb. I've tried some others but they don't seem as good. Paid $5.99 plus $0.99 shipping ($6.98 total). Purchased on 08-29-2010 from Amazon seller "On Line Service Value". Paid $6.99 plus $0.68 tax ($7.67 total). Purchased on 09-06-2010 from Best Buy (brick & mortar).
customer_reviews.author: GoodToBeBob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: great paper for printing. Perfect color of 96 white brightness. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Thinh Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: IT'S PRINTER PAPER, FOLKS!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Ships quickly. What else do you want from printer paper?
customer_reviews.author: John W. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my printer. Good quality. Doesn't smudge. Like that I can order with subscribe and save
customer_reviews.author: TillyFlotz

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of paper and this is good quality fair price too my door.saves time.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia f.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sooner than stated and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I've been lucky with buying through Amazon sellers, which is a relief, since one never knows. Anyway, the paper was securely packed, albeit in a large box, and arrived before the stated time. I priced this and similar paper elsewhere, and this is where I got the best value. Yay! BTW, I'm in NJ at the present time but will be moving to the Southwest next spring. Will they deliver there as quickly? We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: JB55

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any beftrmnhń  u
customer_reviews.text: What can I say except that it is the best paper I have ever purchased .
customer_reviews.author: SUNNI GILBERT

customer_reviews.title: Ok brightness but will bleed through
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the whim and was under the assumption this was similar to other HP paper I've bought before. Turns out that the quality is no different from other office supply companies selling similar 20 lb paper. If you want something better, purchase the 32 lb paper...it is the best, but just be prepared to pay almost 3 times the costs of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lee the Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say, it's paper
customer_reviews.text: Got on sale for $5. Good quality, meets my basic printing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Printer paper?! It's all good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this particular type of HP printer paper for quite some time now. My Canon MP480 printer says: that's All Right, man! And guess what, I ain't gonna switch to any other kind any time soon! I'd like to express special 'Thanks' to the 'Tradecozone' guys for super fast free delivery! I'm very glad, that some companies still know how to do business, the right way!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: white paper... it's just white, #20 ...

customer_reviews.title: This paper is the best in my HP officejet printer
customer_reviews.text: This paper is the best in my HP officejet printer. I have been using it for about two years and like it better than an other paper I have purchased. Arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works just as I wanted. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: tamken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: White paper which holds copied images clear when printed. I print reports for Homeowners Association and have never had a bad copy due to the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Silas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I'm going to buy when I need paper from now on.
customer_reviews.author: James McKinney

customer_reviews.title: HP printer paper.
customer_reviews.text: As good or better than any other printer paper I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great paper - cheaper than the stores
customer_reviews.text: I have seen complaints about the quality of this paper. My personal opinion the paper is fine - it is computer paper so I don't really have high expectations. As long as it doesn't jam my printer, doesn't rip by touching it, and doesn't smear I am happy. So far this paper doesn't do anything of those things - it provides nice clean prints and I have no reason to complain.
customer_reviews.author: KeKo

customer_reviews.title: It's Paper! - Check Around for Better Prices
customer_reviews.text: 3/6/12: I just bought paper at Target and it was $5 for 750 sheets. Same brightness, same weight, works fine in my printer (generic paper). Really look around to get good prices on paper. Original Post: Not much to say on this. It's paper. 96 Brightness, 20 lb, letter size, 500 sheets. That said, it works great in my Canon inkjet photo printer. It never jams or crinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Engee00

customer_reviews.title: it's paper which is getting pretty consistent between brands these days
customer_reviews.text: This one is hard...it's paper which is getting pretty consistent between brands these days. It seems to work fine, Perhaps not as much blockage as I would like, but for the weight, it does as well as can be expected. It prints well. Tough review...it's paper...
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n

customer_reviews.title: Package broken
customer_reviews.text: The package of the paper is broken. First time is good experience, this time is a worse experience
customer_reviews.author: Emily X. Liang

customer_reviews.title: It's paper....it doesn't jam in the printer.  nuff said
customer_reviews.text: How do you come up with a review for paper? It's...well...paper. It's not super thin economy paper. It's not super thick expensive looking paper. It just looks like regular paper. It doesn't jam in my duplex laser printer or my inkjet printer. It doesn't warp that much either.
customer_reviews.author: Tetsu Noguchi

product_meta.title: HP Printer Paper 8.5x11 MultiPurpose 20 lb 1 Ream 500 Sheets 96 Bright Made in USA FSC Certified Copy Paper HP Compatible 112000R
product_meta.description: Size:8.5x11| Style:1 ReamHP Papers is a premium line of uncoated printing paper optimized to provide superior print paper performance when used with HP hardware and supplies and in all other makes and models of printing and copying equipment. Launched in 1996, HP Papers are manufactured and marketed exclusively worldwide in over 75 countries by International Paper, a globally recognized leader in paper products, under license from the Hewlett-Packard Company. With a diverse range of products designed to support a wide range of print applications, from everyday copies to full color presentations, you can be assured of consistent, high quality print performance every time. HP MultiPurpose20 Paper is a 20 lb, super smooth economical and multipurpose paper for everyday printing and copying. HP MultiPupose20 is whiter and brighter than most standard copy paper, producing documents with higher contrast and extra sharpness. Even routine documents look great, with brighter colors and crisp, sharp text. HP MultiPurpose20 printer paper is available in 8.5 x 11 letter size paper, 11 x 17 ledger size paper, and 8.5 x 14 legal size paper. 161 whiteness.
feature_bullets: MADE IN USA - HP Papers is sourced from renewable forest resources and has achieved production with 0% deforestation in North America. See images.
OPTIMIZED FOR HP TECHNOLOGY - All HP Papers provide premium performance on HP equipment, as well as on all other printer and copier equipment. 100% satisfaction guaranteed. See images.

PERFECT MULTIPURPOSE OFFICE PAPER - Brighter than most printer and copy papers for everyday use, MultiPurpose 20 is great for all internal documents, including black and white printing and everyday color printing.

CERTIFIED SUSTAINABLE - HP MultiPurpose20 20lb printer paper is Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified and contributes toward satisfying credit MR1 under LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design). See images.
COLORLOK TECHNOLOGY PRINTING PAPER - Colorlok technology provides more vivid colors, bolder blacks and faster drying. See images.
ACID FREE PAPER – HP MultiPurpose 20lb print and copy paper prevents yellowing over time to ensure a long-lasting appearance for added archival quality.
